column4: hey, i just installed ubuntu 10.10, however i had to use the nomodeset option for the installer so i could install it. now i have to edit my grub line in order to use my OS...however on bootup i dont see any "press (some key) to see grub boot menu" like i previously did....has this changed in 10.10?
yes, you need to hold shift to see the grub menu
